item.title: LLM Security: A Scientific Taxonomy of Attack Vectors
item.description: A technical overview of how LLM security research evolved from adversarial examples to systemic risks: jailbreaks, prompt injection, memorization, backdoors, and supply chain issues.

item.title: ArgusScan: Automating Ethical Pentest with Shodan API
item.description: Introducing ArgusScan, an open-source Python CLI tool that automates ethical pentest reconnaissance using Shodan API, with professional reporting and 96% test coverage.
